properties.title: LA Kings Ice at Pickwick Gardens
properties.description: Our NHL size state of the art arena is the place for you and your family to enjoy hours on the ice.

properties.title: Iceland Ice Skating Center
properties.description: We offer many activities from skating classes to even hosting you birthday party here with us.

properties.title: LA Kings Valley Ice Center
properties.description: We have tons of activities for all ages! We offer Ice Hockey, Public Sessions, Skating School, Stick Times, Figure Skating and much more! We're located in the heart of the San Fernando Valley in Panorma City, CA.

properties.title: Ice at Santa Monica
properties.description: Ice at Santa Monica is back! Join us as we transform the corner of Fifth Street and Arizona Avenue into a winter wonderland.

properties.title: Pasadena Ice Skating Center
properties.description: We continue to provide year-round recreational skating activities for skaters of all ages and ability levels. We have daily public sessions and learn-to-skate group classes for both hockey and figure skating throughout the year.

properties.title: East West Ice Palace
properties.description: Everybody loves to ice skate. We have lots of public skating sessions every week.

properties.title: Toyota Sports Performance Center
properties.description: The Toyota Sports Center is a practice facility for the Los Angeles Kings, and the Ontario Reign, located on 555 North Nash Street in El Segundo, California.

properties.title: LA Kings Iceland in Paramount
properties.description: Olympian Peggy Fleming once practiced at this veteran ice rink, which offers lessons for all levels.

properties.title: The Rinks - Lakewood ICE
properties.description: Guests of all ages enjoy skating at Lakewood ICE during our daily public ice skating sessions on our newly remodeled ice surface.

properties.title: The Cube Santa Clarita
properties.description: Ice rink offering public skating, lessons & hockey training, plus a restaurant & a pro shop.

properties.title: The Skating Edge Ice Arena
properties.description: Enclosed ice arena with public skate times & lessons, hockey leagues, broomball & a snack bar.

properties.title: The Rinks Anaheim ICE
properties.description: Center for public ice skating, skating competitions, minor league hockey games & classes.

properties.title: Iceoplex
properties.description: We are the highly successful training center for our various hockey organizations (Mariners Youth Hockey, LA Kings High School League, CSUN and Cal Lutheran college hockey).

properties.title: The Rinks - KHS ICE
properties.description: Ice skating rink offering special events, birthday party rental & assorted classes.

properties.title: The Rinks - Westminster ICE
properties.description: Indoor ice-skating rink, offering parties, instruction, camps & hockey leagues for adults & kids.

properties.title: LA Kings Ice
properties.description: LA Kings Ice at Promenade on the Peninsula is a LiveBarn Venue.

properties.title: Center Ice Skating Arena
properties.description: Welcome to the Ontario Center Ice Arena, the premier family ice sports complex in the Inland Empire.

properties.title: Ontario Ice Skating Arena Skating School
properties.description: Large ice rink built in 1957, offering open skate times, hockey & skating lessons & party packages.

properties.title: Crystal Ice Skating
properties.description: Crystal Ice Skating provides recreational fun as well as numerous theatrical possibilities year-round!

properties.title: LA Kings Holiday Ice at L.A. LIVE
properties.description: The annual LA Kings Holiday Ice presented by Coca-Cola opens November 26, 2022 - January 8, 2023 at L.A. LIVE!

properties.title: Holiday Ice Rink
properties.description: Opens November 23

properties.title: The Rinks Yorba Linda Ice
properties.description: This indoor ice rink hosts hockey at all levels, plus figure skating & public ice times.

properties.title: Great Park Ice & Fivepoint Arena
properties.description: Great Park Ice & FivePoint Arena is a world-class facility dedicated to the growth and advancement of ice hockey and ice skating in the United States.

properties.title: Lake Forest Ice Palace
properties.description: We are a Training Center for dedicated Figure Skaters and Hockey Players.
